value:
$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|The time has come, Eir.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Mother...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|The summoner. What was the name—
$Nu? No matter.
A linchpin to be pulled, no more.$k$pKill them. Put an end to this.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Please, no...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|I have given you an order.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$EFace|Mother... Of late, I have often
dreamed of you... Only...$k$pThe dreams are hazy. I cannot see
them clearly in my waking mind...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Return to me when you have carried
out my will. Do that, and I will reveal
all that is hidden to you.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I've...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|You've what? No wish to do as I say?
That hardly matters. It is impossible
for you to oppose me.$k$pMy will is synonymous with your very
existence. It has been etched into
your being by endless death.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|OBEY ME, EIR.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$pYes, Mother...$k$p

$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|My mother's castle lies just beyond.
Even as we speak, she is seated there
upon the throne...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|With the power of Angrboða's Heart
within it, $Nu's
weapon is all we need to defeat Hel...$k$pAll that remains is our final
confrontation. Let's not waste
any more time.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Wait, $Nu...$k$pNo—never mind. I'm sorry, it's...
It's nothing. Let's move forward.$k$p$Sbs150|
